mapper.select: SELECT m.* from user_role_relation r INNER JOIN system_role sr ON sr.id = r.role_id INNER JOIN role_menu_relation mr on mr.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN systemMenu m ON m.id = mr.menu_id where r.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.enabled = 1 AND m.enabled = 1 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.menu_sort

SELECT m.id,m.menu_name,m.sort_no,m.component,m.path, m.icon,m.no_cache,m.hidden,m.pid,m.i_frame FROM user_role_relation r INNER JOIN system_role sr ON sr.id = r.role_id INNER JOIN role_menu_relation mr ON mr.role_id = sr.id INNER JOIN system_menu m ON m.id = mr.menu_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId} AND sr.enabled = 1 AND m.enabled = 1 GROUP BY m.id ORDER BY m.sort_no
SELECT id,menu_name,sort_no,component,path,icon,no_cache,hidden,pid,i_frame from system_menu where enabled = 1 ORDER BY sort_no
